content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> "The last dandelion" what do you think about that caption?

This caption utilizes a metaphorical approach, inviting viewers to ponder themes of fleeting beauty and the passage of time, which can evoke an emotional response when paired with the droodle. By encouraging the user to reflect on this imagery and its emotional depth, it fosters a richer exploration of the droodle’s story that can lead to more nuanced and creative captioning.
